subject: FW: MontelShow.com
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
The usual robot mail response.


>From: TheMontelShow.com <themontelshow@...>
>To: franks-boxes@...
>Subject: MontelShow.com
>Date: 14 Feb 2007 19:49:29 -0000
>
>
>Dear Viewer,
>
>Thank you for contacting The Montel Williams Show.  We appreciate your 
>comments and show ideas.  Your letter will be forwarded to our producers 
>and they may contact you in the future.
>
>Below you will find some information from our show that may be useful to 
>you. Thank you for taking the time to contact us.
>
>Sincerely,
>The Viewer Services Department
>
>HELPFUL INFORMATION:
>
>For free tickets to our show, please visit www.montelshow.com.
>
>For information about the Partnership for Prescription Assistance, please 
>visit www.pparx.org or call 1-888-4-PPA-NOW (1-888-477-2669.)
>
>For transcripts or videotape of The Montel Williams Show, please contact:
>
>The Transcription Company
>4100 West Burbank Blvd. 3rd Floor
>Burbank, CA 91505
>Phone: 1-818-848-6500
>Fax: 1-818-556-4150
>http://transcripts.tv/
>
>For information on Sylvia Browne, please visit www.sylvia.org or contact:
>
>Sylvia Browne
>35 Dillon Ave.
>Campbell, CA 95008-3001
>1-408-379-7070
>
>Joseph Culligan is the private investigator used on our show.
>For more information please visit www.josephculligan.com.
>
>For information about the Montel Williams MS Foundation, please visit 
>www.montelms.org. If you would like to make a donation to the Foundation, 
>please make a check payable to the Montel Williams MS Foundation and mail 
>it to:
>
>The Montel Williams MS Foundation
>331 West 57th Street, Suite #420
>New York, NY 10019
>
>The following books were written by Montel:
>- Climbing Higher
>- Life Lessons and Reflections
>- Practical Parenting
>- BodyChange
>- A Dozen Ways to Sunday
>
